resources:
MineSeeker Settings MINE SEEKER Win Sound Bomb Sound Scan Sound' Bomb Image 1. The goal of the game is to find all the hidden bombs with the fewest scans.
2. Tap on a button to look for a bomb.
3. If the button does not contain a bomb it will perform a scan.
4. A scan shows the number of hidden bombs in the column and row related to that button.
5. You can click on a bomb after it has been found to perform a scan on that button By: Kevin Chen Su and Nathan Simms Help Image Bombs found 0 of Scans used: 0 Times Played: High Score: WINNER! Main Menu By: Kevin Chen Su and Nathan Simms TODO skip Board Size Number of Mines RESET TIMES PLAYED and SELECTED HIGHSCORES
